Package com.unibeta.vrules.tools

vRules4j's tools suit, provides a digester to digest plain java object to valid vRules4j configuration automatically.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonSyntaxs
    CommonSyntaxs is a common validation tool delegated by vRules4j engine.
    Java2vRules
    An util vRules4j-Digester tool which is used for digesting the java object to vRules configurations.

Package com.unibeta.vrules.tools Description

vRules4j's tools suit, provides a digester to digest plain java object to valid vRules4j configuration automatically.
